entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Thunder Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:29 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -4.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -4.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 32 km
Humidity: 47 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -14.4°C
Wind: E 37 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy becoming mixed with periods of ice pellets before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets changing to ice pellets mixed with snow at times heavy in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning and afternoon. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow or ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets changing to snow in the evening. Risk of freezing rain early in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
